name: Speed Jet Aviation
about: Speed Jet Aviation is a renowned aviation training academy based in Mumbai, India, with additional locations in Ahmedabad and Kolkata. Founded in 2010, the academy is led by a team of experienced and highly qualified airline pilots and senior cabin attendants. With a solid reputation for trust, quality, and assured results, Speed Jet Aviation offers a range of certificate courses including Pilot Training, Cabin Crew Training (both domestic and international), Ground Staff Training, and Aviation Management Training. The academy is committed to providing top-quality services aligned with international standards, aiming to equip students with a competitive edge in the aviation industry. Under the leadership of Mukesh Bhatia, a veteran with nearly 40 years of experience in aviation, Speed Jet Aviation is dedicated to shaping the future of aviation and expanding its globally recognized training facilities across India.
